name: @mysten/suins
description: An SDK to simplify SuiNS integration.
author: Mysten Labs <build@mystenlabs.com>

scripts.test: echo 'No unit tests for SuiNS SDK'
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm prettier:fix && pnpm lint && pnpm build
scripts.lint: pnpm run eslint:check && pnpm run prettier:check
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run eslint:fix && pnpm run prettier:fix
scripts.prepare:e2e: cargo build --bin sui --profile dev && cross-env RUST_LOG=info,sui=error,anemo_tower=warn,consensus=off cargo run --bin sui -- start --with-faucet --force-regenesis --epoch-duration-ms 300000
